title: Unsecured business loans showing early signs of stress: India Ratings
description: The unsecured business loan market is facing stress in asset quality with rising delinquencies, higher credit costs, and increased write-offs due to competitive lending, overleveraging of borrowers, and cash flow issues in specific segments, India Ratings reports.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
